what: Turns Unstructured Text Data Into A Navigable Landscape
title: Turns Unstructured Text Data Into A Navigable Landscape
text: LandscapeR R Package transforming unstructured raw text navigable landscape. package makes use cutting-edge language models dense word embeddings, dimensionality reduction techniques, clustering /topic modelling well Shiny interactive data-exploration & cleaning UI.

title: Turns Unstructured Text Data Into A Navigable Landscape
text: Install package using install_github function devtools package. devtools::install_github(repo = "jpcompartir/LandscapeR")

title: Quick function for checking if a column is of the right type using data-masking — column_type_checker
code: if (FALSE) { check_text <- df %>% column_type_checker(text_var, "character")  if(check_text == "no") stop("Wrong type")  }

what: Shiny Application of a conversation landscape. — conversation_landscape
title: Shiny Application of a conversation landscape. — conversation_landscape
text: Multiple tabs - one cleaning selecting, others summary plots.

title: Shiny Application of a conversation landscape. — conversation_landscape
code: conversation_landscape(   data,   ...,   id = document,   text_var = text,   colour_var,   cleaned_text_var = clean_text,   date_var = date,   sentiment_var = sentiment,   url_var = permalink,   size = 2,   x_var = V1,   y_var = V2,   type = "scattergl",   colour_mapping = NULL )

title: Shiny Application of a conversation landscape. — conversation_landscape
text: data Data Frame ... Additional Columns select id ID column, one data, create one text_var original text variable display data table colour_var variable wish map colour (string factor) cleaned_text_var cleaned text variable bigram token plots date_var date variable sentiment_var Sentiment variable url_var Variable contains url (preferably using link_click) size size point plotly chart x_var Variable contains x co-ordinates y_var Variable contains y co-ordinates type Type plotly output, unlikely change 'scattergl' colour_mapping colours colour variable mapped

title: Shiny Application of a conversation landscape. — conversation_landscape
